superforo: <entryFree id="n46717" type="main" key="su^perfo^ro"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-fŏro</orth>, <itype>āre, 1</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46717.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to bore from above</hi> (late Lat.), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1011,001:Comp. 84" default="NO"><author>Scrib.</author> Comp. 84</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superfrutico: <entryFree id="n46718" type="hapax" key="su^perfru^ti^co"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-frŭtĭco</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46718.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to sprout forth again;</hi> trop.: <cit><quote lang="la">talia ingenia,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> adv. Valent. 39</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superfugio: <entryFree id="n46719" type="hapax" key="su^perfu^gi^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-fŭgĭo</orth>, <itype>gĕre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46719.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to flee away over</hi> a thing: <cit><quote lang="la">intactas levis ipse superfugit undas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1035,001:3:554" default="NO"><author>Val. Fl.</author> 3, 554</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superfulgeo: <entryFree id="n46720" type="hapax" key="su^perfulgeo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-fulgeo</orth>, <itype>ēre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46720.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to shine over</hi> a thing, <hi rend="ital">to shine forth</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">templa superfulgens,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,002:1:1:33" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> S. 1, 1, 33</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superfundo: <entryFree id="n46721" type="main" key="su^perfundo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-fundo</orth>, füdi, <itype>fūsum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos> <sense id="n46721.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To pour over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi> (mostly <usg type="style">poet.</usg> and in post-Aug. prose; not in Cic. or Cæs.). </sense><sense id="n46721.1" n="A" level="2"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">hanc misturam cum composueris, oleum superfundito,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:12:57:1" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 12, 57, 1</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:4:8:3" default="NO">4, 8, 3</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">unguentum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:9:33:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 9, 33, 9</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">magnam vim telorum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,001:36" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> Agr. 36</bibl></cit>.—<usg type="style"><hi rend="ital">Absol.</hi></usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">potius mare superfunderet adversus terrarum ereptores,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:13:55" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 13, 55 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>— Mid., <hi rend="ital">to pour itself out</hi>, <hi rend="ital">overflow; to spread out</hi>, <hi rend="ital">scatter</hi>, <hi rend="ital">extend</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">Tiberis ripis superfunditur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:8:17:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 8, 17, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Circus Tiberi superfuso irrigatus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:7:3:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 7, 3, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nuda superfusis tingamus corpora lymphis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:2:459" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 2, 459</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">superfusa umoris copia,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:2:28" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 1, 2, 28</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">jacentem hostes superfusi oppresserunt,</quote> <trans><tr>rushing upon him in numbers</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:39:49:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 39, 49, 5</bibl></cit>: Albani gens superfusa montibus Caucasiis, <hi rend="ital">spreading</hi> or <hi rend="ital">scattered over</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:6:39" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 6, 13, 15, § 39</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">Callias hanc habuisse causam superfundendi se Italiae,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:12:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 12, 1, 2, § 5</bibl></cit>: superfusis undis, Sen. Thyest. <cb n="SUPE" /> 584; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:7:365" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 7, 365</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">instar fluminis hostibus superfusi,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Amm.</author> 15, 4, 11</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">25, 6, 12</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n46721.2" n="B" level="2"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">sed nondum fortuna se animo ejus superfuderat,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>become too great for</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:3:12:20" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 3, 12, 20</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superfundens laetitia,</quote> <trans><tr>overflowing</tr>, <tr>extravagant</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:5:7:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 5, 7, 8</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">(Macedonum fama, i. e. nomen, regnum) superfudit se in Asiam,</quote> <trans><tr>spread abroad</tr>, <tr>extended</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:45:9:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 45, 9, 5</bibl></cit>.— </sense><sense id="n46721.3" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To pour</hi> or <hi rend="ital">spread</hi> one thing <hi rend="ital">over</hi> another (very rare): <cit><quote lang="la">compositum oleo superfundito,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:12:57:3" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 12, 57, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">terra superfusa scamnis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:2:4:3" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 2, 4, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sedecim alarum conjuncta signa nube ipsā operient ac superfundent equites equosque,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:3:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> H. 3, 2 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1011,001:Comp. 73" default="NO"><author>Scrib.</author> Comp. 73</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1011,001:257" default="NO">257</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superfusio: <entryFree id="n46722" type="main" key="su^perfu_si^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperfūsĭo</orth>, <itype>ōnis</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <etym>superfundo</etym>, <sense id="n46722.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a pouring</hi> or <hi rend="ital">spreading over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi> (late Lat.): <cit><quote lang="la">aquarum caelestium,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Amm.</author> 17, 7, 12</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">pavimenti,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Pall.</author> 1, 17, 1</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n46722.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">An overflowing</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">haec, Ambros. Hexaëm. 3, 3, 14: aquarum,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 3, 2, 7</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superfusus: <entryFree id="n46723" type="main" key="su^perfu_sus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperfūsus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superfundo.</entryFree>
supergaudeo: <entryFree id="n46724" type="main" key="su^pergaude^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-gaudĕo</orth>, <itype>ēre, 2</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46724.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to rejoice over</hi> (late Lat.): <cit><quote lang="la">alicui,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,027:34:19" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Psa. 34, 19</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Ambros.</author> Ep. 70, 20 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></sense></entryFree>
supergenero: <entryFree id="n46725" type="main" key="su^perge^ne^ro"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-gĕnĕro</orth>, <itype>āre, 1</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46725.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to produce more and more</hi> (late Lat.): <cit><quote lang="la">generatur et supergeneratur usura,</quote> <trans><tr>increases by compound interest</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Ambros.</author> Tob. 13, 43</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supergloriosus: <entryFree id="n46727" type="main" key="su^perglo_ri^o_sus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-glōrĭōsus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, <sense id="n46727.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">exceedingly glorious</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,056:3:53" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Dan. 3, 53</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
supergradior: <entryFree id="n46728" type="main" key="su^pergra^di^or"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpergrădĭor</orth>, <itype>di</itype>, v. supergredior</entryFree>
supergredio: <entryFree id="n46729" type="main" key="su^pergre^di^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpergrĕdĭo</orth>, <itype>dĕre</itype>, v. supergredior <sense id="n46729.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></sense></entryFree>
supergressus: <entryFree id="n46731" type="main" key="su^pergressus1" n="1"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpergressus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of supergredior and supergredio.</entryFree>

<entryFree id="n46732" type="hapax" key="su^pergressus2" n="2"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpergressus</orth>, <itype>ūs</itype>, <gen>m.</gen> <etym>supergredior</etym>, <sense id="n46732.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a surpassing</hi>, <hi rend="ital">exceeding</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">per supergressum,</quote> <trans><tr>beyond measure</tr>, <tr>exceedingly</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Res. Carn. 40</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superhabeo: <entryFree id="n46733" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rha^be^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-hăbĕo</orth>, <itype>ēre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46733.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to have over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi> a thing: <cit><quote lang="la">superhabendum cataplasma,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:7:20:section=7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 7, 20, § 7</bibl></cit> (perhaps it should be written separate, super habendum).</sense></entryFree>
superhumerale: <entryFree id="n46734" type="main" key="su^pe^rhu^me^ra_le"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-hŭmĕrāle</orth>, v. super-umerale.</entryFree>
superi: <entryFree id="n46735" type="main" key="su^pe^ri"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕri</orth>, <itype>ōrum</itype>, v. superus.</entryFree>
superilligo: <entryFree id="n46736" type="main" key="su^pe^rilli^go"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-illĭgo</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46736.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to bind over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:29:40" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 29, 3, 11, § 40</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:30:51" default="NO" valid="yes">30, 6, 17, § 51</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superillino: <entryFree id="n46737" type="main" key="su^perilli^no"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-illĭno</orth> (<orth type="alt" extent="full" lang="la">-inl-</orth>), no <sense id="n46737.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">perf.</hi>, lĭtum (collat. form superillinītum, <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> Herb. 74</bibl>), <itype>3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos> </sense><sense id="n46737.1" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To smear over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">besmear</hi>, <hi rend="ital">anoint</hi> with a thing: <cit><quote lang="la">totum corpus bulbis contritis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:3:19:19" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 3, 19, 19</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n46737.2" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To smear</hi> or <hi rend="ital">spread</hi> a thing <hi rend="ital">over</hi> another: <cit><quote lang="la">idque superillitum panniculo imponendum est,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:6:18:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 6, 18, 9</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superinlito butyro ovillo cum melle,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:30:111" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 30, 12, 37, § 111</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sucus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> Herb. 74</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superillitus: <entryFree id="n46738" type="main" key="su^perilli^tus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperillĭtus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superillino.</entryFree>
superimmitto: <entryFree id="n46740" type="hapax" key="su^perimmitto"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-immitto</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46740.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to throw over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">jecur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2003,001:2:1" default="NO"><author>Apic.</author> 2, 1</bibl></cit>. <pb n="1807" /> <cb n="SUPE" /></sense></entryFree>
superimpendo: <entryFree id="n46742" type="main" key="su^pe^rimpendo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-impendo</orth>, <itype>ĕre, 3</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46742.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to spend</hi> or <hi rend="ital">exhaust</hi> upon any thing, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0031,008:12:15" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> 2 Cor. 12, 15</bibl> (transl. of <foreign lang="greek">e)kdapana/w</foreign>).</sense></entryFree>
superimpleo: <entryFree id="n46743" type="spur" key="su^pe^rimple^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-implĕo</orth>, <itype>ēre</itype>, falsely assumed as <sense id="n46743.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">v. a.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">implenturque super puppes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:5:697" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 5, 697</bibl></cit>; v. super, I. A.</sense></entryFree>
superimpono: <entryFree id="n46744" type="main" key="su^pe^rimpo_no"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-impōno</orth> (<orth type="alt" extent="full" lang="la">-inpōno</orth>), no <sense id="n46744.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">perf.</hi>, <itype>pŏsitum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">to put</hi>, <hi rend="ital">place</hi>, or <hi rend="ital">lay upon</hi> (not ante-Aug.): <cit><quote lang="la">saxum ingens,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:39:50:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 39, 50, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">statua superimposita,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:38:56:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 38, 56, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">manum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:1:27" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 1, 1, 27</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">allium,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:5:27:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 5, 27, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">cataplasmata,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:3:10" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 3, 10</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">radicem arundinis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:5:26:35" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 5, 26, 35</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superinposito linteolo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:31:103" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 31, 9, 45, § 103</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,002:1:1" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> S. 1, 1</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superimpositus: <entryFree id="n46745" type="main" key="su^pe^rimpo^si^tus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrimpŏsĭtus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superimpono.</entryFree>
superincendo: <entryFree id="n46746" type="hapax" key="superincendo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">super-incendo</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46746.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to inflame more</hi> or <hi rend="ital">greatly</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">hanc (Venus),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1035,001:2:124" default="NO"><author>Val. Fl.</author> 2, 124</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superincerno: <entryFree id="n46747" type="main" key="su^pe^rincerno"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrincerno</orth>, <itype>ĕre, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos> <etym>super-incerno</etym>, <sense id="n46747.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to sift upon</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:17:74" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 17, 10, 14, § 74</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superincidens: <entryFree id="n46748" type="main" key="su^pe^rinci^dens"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-incĭdens</orth>, <itype>entis</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> [incido], <sense id="n46748.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">falling from above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">falling down</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">tela,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:2:10:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 2, 10, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">viri,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:23:15:13" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 23, 15, 13</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">caelestis aqua,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:4:9:1" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 4, 9, 1</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superincido: <entryFree id="n46749" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rinci_do"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-incīdo</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46749.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to cut into above</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">cutem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:7:31:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 7, 31, 7</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superincresco: <entryFree id="n46750" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rincresco"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-incresco</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46750.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to grow over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">nimius callus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:8:19" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 8, 19 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit></sense></entryFree>
superincubans: <entryFree id="n46751" type="main" key="su^pe^rincu^bans"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-incŭbans</orth>, <itype>antis</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> [incubo], <sense id="n46751.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">lying over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">Romanus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:22:51" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 22, 51</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superincumbo: <entryFree id="n46752" type="main" key="su^pe^rincumbo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-incumbo</orth>, <itype>cŭbŭi, 3</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46752.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to lay</hi> or <hi rend="ital">cast one</hi>'<hi rend="ital">s self upon</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,002:11:57" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> H. 11, 57</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">11, 117</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superincurvatus: <entryFree id="n46753" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rincurva_tus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-incurvātus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, <sense id="n46753.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">bent</hi> or <hi rend="ital">stooping over</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> M. 9, p. 220, 13</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superindictum: <entryFree id="n46754" type="main" key="su^pe^rindictum"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-indictum</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>, <sense id="n46754.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">an extraordinary impost</hi> (jurid. Lat.): <cit><quote lang="la">de superindicto,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Cod. Just.</author> 10, 18</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">10, 17, 1</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">11, 74, 1</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superinduco: <entryFree id="n46755" type="main" key="su^pe^rindu_co"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-indūco</orth>, <itype>xi, ctum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos> <sense id="n46755.0" n="I" level="1"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg>, <hi rend="ital">to draw over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">cover over</hi> (post-Aug.): <cit><quote lang="la">corpus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:5:8:2" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 5, 8, 2</bibl></cit> <hi rend="ital">N. cr.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">terram,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:15:61" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 15, 17, 18, § 61</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">tabellas cerā delitā,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:2:10:14" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> 2, 10, 14</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n46755.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To cause to come upon</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to bring upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">eis principes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,016:33:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> 2 Par. 33, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">in nos magnum malum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,056:9:12" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Dan. 9, 12</bibl></cit>.— </sense><sense id="n46755.2" n="III" level="1"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg>, <hi rend="ital">to mention afterwards</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to add</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">dispositionem caeli,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> adv. Herm. 26</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superinducticius: <entryFree id="n46756" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rinducti_ci^us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrinductīcĭus</orth> or <orth extent="full" lang="la">-tĭus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos> <etym>superinduco</etym>, <sense id="n46756.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">supposititious</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">fratres (with falsi),</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> adv. Marc. 5, 3</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superinductio: <entryFree id="n46757" type="main" key="su^pe^rinducti^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrinductĭo</orth>, <itype>ōnis</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <etym>id.</etym>, <sense id="n46757.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">an erasing</hi> any thing written, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:28:4:1:section=1" default="NO"><author>Dig.</author> 28, 4, 1, § 1</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superinductus: <entryFree id="n46758" type="main" key="su^pe^rinductus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrinductus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superinduco.</entryFree>
superindumentum: <entryFree id="n46759" type="main" key="su^pe^rindu_mentum"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrindūmentum</orth>, <itype>i</itype>, <gen>n.</gen> <etym>superinduo</etym>, <sense id="n46759.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">an ouler garment</hi> (eccl. Lat.), <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Res. Carn. 42</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> adv. Marc. 5, 12 al.</bibl></sense></entryFree>
superinduo: <entryFree id="n46760" type="main" key="su^pe^rindu^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-indŭo</orth>, <itype>ŭi, ūtum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46760.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to put on over</hi> other clothes (post-Aug.). </sense><sense id="n46760.1" n="I" level="1"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">paenulam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=nero:48" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Ner. 48</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> adv. Marc. 5, 12</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n46760.2" n="II" level="1"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">superinduti substantiā aeternitatis,</quote> <trans><tr>clothed with</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Apol 48 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">in hac carne domicilium indui solet,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> Res. Carn. 42</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superindutus: <entryFree id="n46761" type="main" key="su^pe^rindu_tus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrindūtus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superinduo.</entryFree>
superinfundo: <entryFree id="n46762" type="main" key="su^pe^rinfundo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-infundo</orth>, no <sense id="n46762.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">perf.</hi>, <itype>fūsum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">to pour over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">aquam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:5:25:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 5, 25, 4</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:3:20" default="NO" valid="yes">3, 20</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">mel,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:8:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 8, 4 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit></sense></entryFree>
superinfusus: <entryFree id="n46763" type="main" key="su^pe^rinfu_sus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrinfūsus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superinfundo.</entryFree>
superingero: <entryFree id="n46764" type="main" key="su^pe^ringe^ro"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-ingĕro</orth>, no <sense id="n46764.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">perf.</hi>, <itype>gestum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">to bring upon</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to casl</hi> or <hi rend="ital">heap upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">acervos leguminum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:18:308" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 18, 30, 73, § 308</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">montem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,002:1:1:59" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> S. 1, 1, 59</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">illapsae superingeruntur escae,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Prud.</author> Cath. 4, 87</bibl></cit>.—<usg type="style">Poet.</usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">ubi non umquam Titan superingerit ortus,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>does not pour down his morning beams</tr>, <tr>does not shine</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0660,001:4" default="NO"><author>Tib.</author> 4</bibl></cit> (5), 1, 157 (al. super egerit).</sense></entryFree>
superingestus: <entryFree id="n46765" type="main" key="su^pe^ringestus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕringestus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superingero.</entryFree>
superinicio: <entryFree id="n46766" type="main" key="su^pe^ri_ni^ci^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-īnĭcĭo</orth>, no <sense id="n46766.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">perf.</hi>, <itype>jectum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">to throw on</hi> or <hi rend="ital">above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to cast over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi> (<usg type="style">poet.</usg> and in post-Aug. prose): <cit><quote lang="la">raras frondes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:4:46" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 4, 46</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">textum rude,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:8:640" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 8, 640</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">terram,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,007:5:533" default="NO"><author>id.</author> F. 5, 533</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">togas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,010:6:570" default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 6, 570</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">folia contrita et illita,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:5:26:33" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 5, 26, 33</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">fimum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:17:53" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 17, 9, 6, § 53</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superinjectus: <entryFree id="n46767" type="main" key="su^pe^rinjectus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrinjectus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superinicio. <cb n="SUPE" /></entryFree>
superinspicio: <entryFree id="n46768" type="main" key="su^pe^rinspi^ci^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-inspĭcĭo</orth>, <itype>cĕre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46768.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to oversee</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to superintend</hi> (eccl. Lat.): <cit><quote lang="la">sacra ecclesiae,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Sid.</author> Ep. 9, 3 <hi rend="ital">med.</hi></bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">6, 1</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superinsterno: <entryFree id="n46769" type="main" key="su^pe^rinsterno"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-insterno</orth>, <itype>strāvi, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46769.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to spread</hi> or <hi rend="ital">lay over</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">tabulas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:30:10:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 30, 10, 5</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1345,001:7:28" default="NO"><author>Sil.</author> 7, 28</bibl>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:2:722" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 2, 722</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superinstillo: <entryFree id="n46770" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rinstillo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-instillo</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46770.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to drop upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">olei modicum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2003,001:4:2" default="NO"><author>Apic.</author> 4, 2 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit></sense></entryFree>
superinstrepo: <entryFree id="n46771" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rinstre^po"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-instrĕpo</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46771.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to sound above</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">axis perfractis ossibus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1345,001:2:186" default="NO"><author>Sil.</author> 2, 186</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superinstructus: <entryFree id="n46772" type="main" key="su^pe^rinstructus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrinstructus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superinstruo.</entryFree>
superinstruo: <entryFree id="n46773" type="main" key="su^pe^rinstru^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-instrŭo</orth>, no <sense id="n46773.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">perf.</hi>, <itype>ctum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">to build over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon; to arrange over one another</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">ut concameratis superinstruas,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Cod. Just.</author> 8, 10, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ordines vasorum in altitudinem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:9:7:3" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 9, 7, 3</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superinsultans: <entryFree id="n46774" type="main" key="su^pe^rinsultans"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-insultans</orth>, <itype>antis</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> [insulto], <sense id="n46774.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">leaping about upon</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Claud.</author> Gigant. 83</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superintego: <entryFree id="n46775" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rinte^go"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-intĕgo</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46775.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to cover over</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">ora fossarum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:18:47" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 18, 6, 8, § 47</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superintendo: <entryFree id="n46776" type="main" key="su^perintendo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-intendo</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46776.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to have the oversight of</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to superintend</hi> (eccl. Lat.): <cit><quote lang="la">ut ipsi superintendant et quasi custodiant populum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2468,001:in Psa. 126" default="NO"><author>Aug.</author> in Psa. 126</bibl></cit>, n. 3; id. Civ. Dei, 19, 19; <bibl default="NO"><author>Hier.</author> Ep. 146, 1</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superintentor: <entryFree id="n46777" type="main" key="su^pe^rintentor"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrintentor</orth>, <itype>ōris</itype>, <gen>m.</gen> <etym>superintendo</etym>, <sense id="n46777.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">an overseer</hi>, <hi rend="ital">superintendent</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2468,001:in Psa. 126" default="NO"><author>Aug.</author> in Psa. 126</bibl>, n. 3.</sense></entryFree>
superinundo: <entryFree id="n46778" type="hapax" key="su^pe^ri^nundo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-ĭnundo</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46778.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to overflow;</hi> trop.: ejusmodi eloquiis, Tert. Res. Carn. <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></sense></entryFree>
superinungo: <entryFree id="n46779" type="main" key="su^pe^ri^nungo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-ĭnungo</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46779.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to smear over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to besmear</hi>, <hi rend="ital">anoint</hi> with any thing: <cit><quote lang="la">oculos collyrio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:7:7:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 7, 7, 1</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:7:7:2" default="NO" valid="yes">7, 7, 2</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:7:7:8" default="NO" valid="yes">7, 7, 8</bibl>; 6, 6, 1.</sense></entryFree>
superinveho: <entryFree id="n46780" type="hapax" key="su^pe^rinve^ho"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-invĕho</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46780.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to carry above</hi> or <hi rend="ital">over</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">speciem monstri,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Avien.</author> Arat. 1157</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superior: <entryFree id="n46781" type="main" key="su^pe^ri^or"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrĭor</orth>, <itype>ōris</itype>, v. superus.</entryFree>
superirruo: <entryFree id="n46782" type="main" key="su^pe^rirru^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕr-irrŭo</orth>, <itype>ĕre, 3</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46782.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to fall in upon</hi> or <hi rend="ital">over</hi>: igni, Mar. Vict. Fratr. Machab. 263.</sense></entryFree>
superius: <entryFree id="n46783" type="main" key="su^pe^ri^us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕrĭus</orth>, <sense id="n46783.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">comp.</hi> </sense><sense id="n46783.1" n="1" level="3"> <hi rend="ital">Neutr.</hi> of superior, v. superus.—</sense><sense id="n46783.2" n="2" level="3"> From <itype>supra</itype>, <pos>adv.</pos>, q. v.</sense></entryFree>
superjaceo: <entryFree id="n46784" type="hapax" key="su^perja^ce^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-jăcĕo</orth>, <itype>ēre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46784.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to lie over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">cataplasma,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:8:9:18" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 8, 9, 18</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superjacio: <entryFree id="n46785" type="main" key="su^perja^ci^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-jăcĭo</orth>, <itype>jēci, jectum</itype> (superjactus, Sall. Fragm. ap. Non 503, 33; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:5:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> H. 5, 6</bibl>), <itype>3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos> <sense id="n46785.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To cast</hi> or <hi rend="ital">throw over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon</hi> (mostly post-Aug.; not in Cic. or Cæs.). </sense><sense id="n46785.1" n="A" level="2"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">membra superjectā cum tua veste fovet,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,002:16:222" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> H. 16, 222</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">semina de tabulato,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:2:17:2" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 2, 17, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">folia,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:2:1:6" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 2, 1, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">aggerem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=cal.:19" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Calig. 19</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">se rogo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1038,001:1:8:10" default="NO"><author>Val. Max.</author> 1, 8, 10</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1038,001:6:6:1" default="NO">6, 6, 1</bibl> <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">ut ille ardentibus tectis superjaceretur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1038,001:3:2" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 3, 2</bibl></cit>, ext. 7: et superjecto pavidae natarunt Aequore damae, i. e. <hi rend="ital">spread over</hi> the earth, <hi rend="ital">overwhelming</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:1:2:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 1, 2, 11</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">Phrygia Troadi superjecta,</quote> <trans><tr>situated above Troas</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:5:145" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 5, 32, 41, § 145</bibl></cit>.—* </sense><sense id="n46785.2" n="B" level="2"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg>, <hi rend="ital">to overdo</hi>, <hi rend="ital">exaggerate</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">superjecere quidam augendo fidem,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:10:30:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 10, 30, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">beneficia ( = superare),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Ben. 3:32" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Ben. 3, 32 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:ib. 7:9:4" default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 7, 9, 4</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n46785.3" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To overtop</hi> with any thing (very rare): <cit><quote lang="la">pontus scopulos superjacit unda,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:11:625" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 11, 625</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">arbores tantae proceritatis, ut sagittis superjaci nequeant,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:7:21" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 7, 2, 2, § 21</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superjacto: <entryFree id="n46786" type="main" key="su^perjacto"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-jacto</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos> * <sense id="n46786.0" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To fling</hi> or <hi rend="ital">toss up</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">infantes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1038,001:9:2:4" default="NO"><author>Val. Max.</author> 9, 2, 4</bibl></cit>.—* </sense><sense id="n46786.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To spring over</hi> a thing: <cit><quote lang="la">mugiles transversa navigia superjactant,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:9:54" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 9, 15, 21, § 54</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superjactus: <entryFree id="n46787" type="main" key="su^perjactus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperjactus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, v. superjacio <sense id="n46787.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">init.</hi></sense></entryFree>
superjectio: <entryFree id="n46788" type="main" key="su^perjecti^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperjectĭo</orth>, <itype>ōnis</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <etym>superjacio</etym>. * <sense id="n46788.0" n="I" level="1"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg>, <hi rend="ital">a throwing over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">on</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">vestium,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Arn.</author> 3, 108</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n46788.1" n="II" level="1"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg>, in rhet., <hi rend="ital">an exaggeration</hi>, <hi rend="ital">hyperbole</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:8:6:67" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 8, 6, 67</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superjectus: <entryFree id="n46789" type="main" key="su^perjectus1" n="1"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperjectus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> of superjacio.</entryFree>

<entryFree id="n46790" type="hapax" key="su^perjectus2" n="2"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperjectus</orth>, <itype>ūs</itype>, <gen>m.</gen> <etym>superjacio</etym>, <sense id="n46790.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a leaping upon</hi>, <hi rend="ital">covering</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:6:36:4" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 6, 36, 4</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superjumentarius: <entryFree id="n46791" type="hapax" key="su^perju_menta_ri^us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-jūmentārĭus</orth>, <itype>ii</itype>, <gen>m.</gen>, <sense id="n46791.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a superintendent of the drivers of beasts of burden</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=cl.:2" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Claud. 2</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superjungo: <entryFree id="n46792" type="main" key="su^perjungo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-jungo</orth>, <itype>ĕre, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46792.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to subjoin</hi>, <hi rend="ital">add</hi> (late Lat.), Inc. Quaest. ex. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0594,001:Fest. 95" default="NO"><author>Nov.</author> Fest. 95</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superlabor: <entryFree id="n46793" type="main" key="su^perla_bor"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-lābor</orth>, <itype>bi</itype>, <sense id="n46793.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">v. n. dep.</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to glide</hi> or <hi rend="ital">run over</hi> (very rare): <cit><quote lang="la">in aperto jacentes sidera superlabebantur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Ep. 90:42" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Ep. 90, 42</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Sid.</author> Ep. 1, 2 <hi rend="ital">med.</hi></bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:30:25:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 30, 25, 6</bibl> (dub.).</sense></entryFree>
superlacrimo: <entryFree id="n46794" type="hapax" key="su^perla^cri^mo"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-lăcrĭmo</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46794.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to weep</hi> or <hi rend="ital">drop upon</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">vitis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:4:24:16" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 4, 24, 16</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superlatio: <entryFree id="n46795" type="main" key="su^perla_ti^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperlātĭo</orth>, <itype>ōnis</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <etym>superfero</etym>. <sense id="n46795.0" n="I" level="1"> In <cb n="SUPE" /> rhet., <hi rend="ital">an exaggerating</hi>, <hi rend="ital">hyperbole</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">veritatis superlatio atque trajectio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,037:3:53:203" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> de Or. 3, 53, 203</bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl default="NO"><author>Auct. Her.</author> 4, 33, 44</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:9:2:3" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 9, 2, 3</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:9:1:29" default="NO">9, 1, 29</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:12:10:62" default="NO">12, 10, 62</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">malignitatis,</quote> <trans><tr>the highest degree</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> Dogm. Plat. 2, p. 20, 40</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n46795.1" n="II" level="1"> In gram., <hi rend="ital">the superlative</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">(soloecismus) per comparationes et superlationes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1002,001:1:5:45" default="NO"><author>Quint.</author> 1, 5, 45</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Charis.</author> p. 88 sq.</bibl> P.</sense></entryFree>
superlativus: <entryFree id="n46796" type="main" key="su^perla_ti_vus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperlātīvus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos> <etym>superlatus</etym>; <sense id="n46796.0" n="I" level="1"><cit><quote lang="la">in gram.: nomen,</quote> <trans><tr>superlative</tr>, <tr>in the superlative degree</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Charis.</author> p. 87</bibl></cit> P.; <bibl default="NO"><author>Prisc.</author> p. 605</bibl> ib.—</sense><sense id="n46796.1" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">Hyperbolic</hi>, <hi rend="ital">exaggerated</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">sententiae,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Isid.</author> 2, 21, 16</bibl></cit>. — <itype>Hence</itype>, <pos>adv.</pos>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperlātīvē</orth>, <hi rend="ital">superlatively</hi>, <hi rend="ital">in the superlative</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Charis.</author> p. 87</bibl> P.</sense></entryFree>
superlatus: <entryFree id="n46797" type="main" key="su^perla_tus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperlātus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> and <pos>P. a.</pos> of superfero.</entryFree>
superlaudabilis: <entryFree id="n46798" type="main" key="su^perlauda_bi^lis"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-laudābĭlis</orth>, <itype>e</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, <sense id="n46798.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">extremely to be praised</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,056:3:53" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Dan. 3, 53</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">3, 54</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superlimen: <entryFree id="n46799" type="gloss" key="su^perli_men"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperlīmen</orth>, <itype>ĭnis</itype>, <gen>n.</gen> <etym>super-limen</etym>, <sense id="n46799.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a lintel</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:29:83" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 29, 4, 26, § 83</bibl>: LAPIDEVM, Inscr. Marin. Fratr. Arv. p. 324.</sense></entryFree>
superliminare: <entryFree id="n46800" type="main" key="su^perli_mi^na_re"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperlīmĭnāre</orth>, <itype>is</itype>, <gen>n.</gen> <etym>superlimen</etym>, <sense id="n46800.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a lintel</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,002:12:23" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Exod. 12, 23</bibl>.— <hi rend="ital">Plur.</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Vulg.</author> Amos, 9, 1</bibl> (transl. of the Heb. <foreign />); <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,002:12:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Exod. 12, 7</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superlino: <entryFree id="n46801" type="main" key="su^perli^no"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-lĭno</orth>, no <sense id="n46801.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">perf.</hi>, <itype>lĭtum, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <hi rend="ital">to daub</hi> or <hi rend="ital">smear over</hi> (post-Aug.). </sense><sense id="n46801.1" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To daub</hi> or <hi rend="ital">smear</hi> a thing <hi rend="ital">over</hi> something: <cit><quote lang="la">radicem in vino decoctam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:27:42" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 27, 6, 24, § 42</bibl></cit>. — </sense><sense id="n46801.2" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">To smear over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">besmear</hi> with something: <cit><quote lang="la">laser visco, ut haereat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:22:103" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 22, 23, 49, § 103</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">dolium,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Pall.</author> Oct. 14, 5</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superlitio: <entryFree id="n46802" type="main" key="su^perli^ti^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭperlĭtĭo</orth>, <itype>ōnis</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <etym>superlino</etym>, <sense id="n46802.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a smearing over</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Marc. Emp.</author> 8 <hi rend="ital">med.</hi></bibl></sense></entryFree>
superluceo: <entryFree id="n46803" type="main" key="su^perlu_ce^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-lūcĕo</orth>, <itype>ēre, 2</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46803.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to shine</hi> (late Lat.), <bibl default="NO"><author>Hier.</author> in Psa. 89</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
superlucror: <entryFree id="n46804" type="main" key="su^perlucror"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-lucror</orth>, <itype>āri, 1</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46804.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to gain in addition</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">talenta,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0031,001:25:20" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Matt. 25, 20</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superlugeo: <entryFree id="n46805" type="main" key="su^perlu_ge^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-lūgĕo</orth>, <itype>ēre, 2</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46805.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to mourn over in addition</hi> (late Lat.), Aug. in Job, 27.</sense></entryFree>
supermando: <entryFree id="n46806" type="main" key="su^permando"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-mando</orth>, <itype>ĕre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46806.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to chew</hi> or <hi rend="ital">eat after</hi> something else: <cit><quote lang="la">raphanos,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:31:65" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 31, 6, 33, § 65</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supermeo: <entryFree id="n46807" type="main" key="su^perme^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-mĕo</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos> and <sense id="n46807.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a.</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to go</hi>, <hi rend="ital">glide</hi>, or <hi rend="ital">flow over</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">aquae,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:2:224" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 2, 103, 106, § 224</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Amm.</author> 24, 1, 7</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Sol.</author> 37 <hi rend="ital">med.</hi></bibl></sense></entryFree>
supermetior: <entryFree id="n46808" type="main" key="su^perme_ti^or"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-mētĭor</orth>, <itype>mensus, 4</itype>, <sense id="n46808.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">v. dep. a.</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to mete out abundantly</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">alimenta,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Anim. 38</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supermico: <entryFree id="n46809" type="main" key="su^permi^co"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-mĭco</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46809.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to leap over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">beyond</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">austrum,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Avien.</author> 845</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supermitto: <entryFree id="n46810" type="main" key="su^permitto"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-mitto</orth>, <itype>mīsi, 3</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46810.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to throw</hi> or <hi rend="ital">pour over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">upon; to put in afterwards</hi>, <hi rend="ital">add</hi>, etc (post-class.): <cit><quote lang="la">aquam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:12:14:9" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> 12, 14, 9</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:10:4:20" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 10, 4, 20</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2003,001:5:3:section=194" default="NO"><author>Apic.</author> 5, 3, § 194</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2003,001:2:1:section=40" default="NO">2, 1, § 40</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
supermolaris: <entryFree id="n46811" type="hapax" key="su^permo^la_ris"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-mŏlāris</orth>, <itype>e</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>: <sense id="n46811.0" n="I" level="1"><cit><quote lang="la">lapis,</quote> <trans><tr>the upper millstone</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Ambros.</author> Tob. 21, 83</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supermundialis: <entryFree id="n46812" type="hapax" key="su^permundi^a_lis"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-mundĭālis</orth>, <itype>e</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, <sense id="n46812.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">that is above the world</hi>, <hi rend="ital">supermundane</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">substantiae,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Anim. 18</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supermunio: <entryFree id="n46813" type="hapax" key="su^permu_ni^o"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-mūnĭo</orth>, <itype>īre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46813.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to fortify</hi> or <hi rend="ital">protect above</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">alvearia porticibus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:9:7:4" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 9, 7, 4</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supernans: <entryFree id="n46814" type="main" key="su^pernans"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-nans</orth>, <itype>nantis</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> [no], <sense id="n46814.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">swimming above</hi> or <hi rend="ital">at top</hi>, <bibl default="NO"><author>Macr.</author> S. 7, 12</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
supernas: <entryFree id="n46815" type="main" key="su^pernas"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpernas</orth>, <itype>ātis</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos> <etym>supernus</etym>, <sense id="n46815.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">of</hi> or <hi rend="ital">belonging to the upper country</hi>, <hi rend="ital">upper</hi> or <hi rend="ital">northern</hi>, as regards Rome (post-Aug.): <cit><quote lang="la">Caretini (opp. infernates),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:3:106" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 3, 12, 17, § 106</bibl></cit>: abies, i. e. <hi rend="ital">growing on the Upper</hi> or <hi rend="ital">Adriatic Sea</hi> (opp. infernas, of the Tyrrhene Sea), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:16:197" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 16, 39, 76, § 197</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">persica e Sabinis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:15:40" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 15, 12, 11, § 40</bibl></cit>: VINVM, Inscr. Rein. cl. 3, n. 88; cf. <bibl default="NO"><author>Inscr. Orell.</author> 995</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ventus,</quote> <trans><tr>the northeast-by-north wind</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1056,001:1:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vitr.</author> 1, 6</bibl></cit>.—Augustus jestingly called Maecenas adamas supernas (as the Adriatic produced no diamonds), <bibl default="NO"><author>Macr.</author> S. 2, 4</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
supernato: <entryFree id="n46816" type="main" key="su^perna^to"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-năto</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos>, <sense id="n46816.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to swim above</hi> or <hi rend="ital">on top</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to float</hi> (post-Aug.), <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:12:9:2" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 12, 9, 2</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:7:65" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 7, 15, 13, § 65</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:28:134" default="NO" valid="yes">28, 9, 35, § 134</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> M. 6, p. 180, 36</bibl>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Paul. Nol.</author> Carm. 21, 179</bibl>.— With <hi rend="ital">dat.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">arieti (Phryxum),</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> M. 6, p. 185, 33</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supernatus: <entryFree id="n46817" type="main" key="su^perna_tus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-nātus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <mood>Part.</mood> [nascor], <sense id="n46817.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">growing over</hi> or <hi rend="ital">above</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">gravia ulcera,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0836,001:8:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cels.</author> 8, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">caule,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:19:45" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 19, 3, 15, § 45</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
superne: <entryFree id="n46818" type="main" key="su^perne_"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpernē</orth>, <pos>adv.</pos>, v. supernus <sense id="n46818.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></sense></entryFree>
supernitas: <entryFree id="n46819" type="main" key="su^perni^tas"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpernĭtas</orth>, <itype>ātis</itype>, <gen>f.</gen> <etym>supernus</etym>, <sense id="n46819.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">highness</hi>, <hi rend="ital">height</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">supernitatum,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> adv. Val. 7</bibl></cit></sense></entryFree>
supernomino: <entryFree id="n46820" type="main" key="su^perno_mi^no"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-nōmĭno</orth>, <itype>āre</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46820.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to surname</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">quem Philadelphum,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Tert.</author> Apol. 18</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supernumerarius: <entryFree id="n46821" type="main" key="su^pernu^me^ra_ri^us"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-nŭmĕrārĭus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos>, <sense id="n46821.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">supernumerary</hi> (post-class.): accensi, hoc est <pb n="1808" /> <cb n="SUPE" /> postea additi, quam fuisset legio completa, quos nunc supernumerarios vocant, <bibl default="NO"><author>Veg.</author> Mil. 2, 19 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2468,001:in Psa. 146:9" default="NO"><author>Aug.</author> in Psa. 146, 9</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
supernumero: <entryFree id="n46822" type="main" key="su^pernu^me^ro"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭper-nŭmĕro</orth>, <itype>āre, 1</itype>, <pos>v. a.</pos>, <sense id="n46822.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">to count in over and above</hi> (late Lat.), Primas ad Apoc. 3, ad. 9, 16.</sense></entryFree>
supernus: <entryFree id="n46823" type="main" key="su^pernus"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpernus</orth>, <itype>a, um</itype>, <pos>adj.</pos> <etym>super</etym>, <sense id="n46823.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">that is above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">on high</hi>, <hi rend="ital">upper; celestial</hi>, <hi rend="ital">supernal</hi> (mostly post-Aug.; <cit><quote lang="la">not in Cic. or Cæs.): pars oris,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:7:69" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 7, 16, 15, § 69</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">vulnera,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:2:147" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 2, 56, 57, § 147</bibl></cit>: Tusculum, <hi rend="ital">lofty</hi>, i. e. <hi rend="ital">standing on high ground</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,003:1:29" default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Epod. 1, 29</bibl>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">ballistae in humiliora ex supernis valentes,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Amm.</author> 19, 7, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superna (opp. inferna),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:5:647" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 5, 647</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">jactus ex supernis in infima,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:9:1:2" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 9, 1, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">album mutor in alitem Superna,</quote> <trans><tr>above</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:2:20:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 2, 20, 11</bibl></cit> Muret. (al. superne): <cit><quote lang="la">aquilones, qui alti supernique sunt,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:2:30:9" default="NO"><author>Gell.</author> 2, 30, 9</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">partes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1254,001:12:1:13" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 12, 1, 13</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">numen,</quote> <trans><tr>celestial</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:15:128" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 15, 128</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">dei,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:6:430" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 6, 430</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">lux,</quote> <trans><tr>of the sun</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:6:733" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 6, 733</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">leges,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:9:556" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 9, 556</bibl></cit>: superna litora, <hi rend="ital">the upper</hi>, i. e. <hi rend="ital">northern shore</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0929,001:2:4" default="NO"><author>Mel.</author> 2, 4</bibl>.—<hi rend="ital">Adv.</hi>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpernē</orth> (with short e, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:6:544" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 6, 544</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:6:597" default="NO" valid="yes">6, 597</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:2:20:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 2, 20, 11</bibl>), <hi rend="ital">from above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">upwards</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">neve ruant caeli penetralia templa superne,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:1:1105" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 1, 1105</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superne in statione locata,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:6:192" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 6, 192</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">desinat in piscem mulier formosa superne,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,006:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> A. P. 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">non peccat superne,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,004:2:7:64" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> S. 2, 7, 64</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">volvitur amnis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:6:659" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 6, 659</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">gladium superne jugulo defigit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:1:25:12" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 1, 25, 12</bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:1:51:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 1, 51, 9</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:7:10:9" default="NO" valid="yes">7, 10, 9</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">hoc genus superne tendit,</quote> <trans><tr>up</tr>, <tr>upwards</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:19:76" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 19, 5, 25, § 76</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
supero: <entryFree id="n46824" type="main" key="su^pe^ro"><orth extent="full" lang="la">sŭpĕro</orth>, <itype>āvi, ātum, 1</itype>, <pos>v. n.</pos> and <sense id="n46824.0" n="I" level="1"><hi rend="ital">a.</hi> [id.]. </sense><sense id="n46824.1" n="I" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">Neutr.</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to go over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to rise above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">overtop</hi>, <hi rend="ital">surmount.</hi> </sense><sense id="n46824.2" n="A" level="2"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg> (very rare; syn. transcendo): maximo saltu superabit gravidus armatis equus, <hi rend="ital">surmounted</hi>, <hi rend="ital">leaped the wall</hi>, Enn. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Macr.</author> S. 6, 2</bibl> (Trag. v. 97 Vahl.): <cit><quote lang="la">sol superabat ex mari,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,018:2:2:41" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Stich. 2, 2, 41</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ripis superat mihi atque abundat pectus laetitia meum,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 2, 1, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">jugo superans,</quote> <trans><tr>passing over the summit</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:11:514" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 11, 514</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superat agger ad auras,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1020,001:4:458" default="NO"><author>Stat.</author> Th. 4, 458</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">(angues) superant capite et cervicibus altis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:2:219" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 2, 219</bibl></cit>. — </sense><sense id="n46824.3" n="B" level="2"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg> (freq. and class.). </sense><sense id="n46824.4" n="1" level="3"> <hi rend="ital">To have the upper hand</hi> or <hi rend="ital">superiority</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to be superior</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to overcome</hi>, <hi rend="ital">surpass</hi> (syn. vinco): <cit><quote lang="la">denique nostra superat manus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,001:1:1:80" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Am. 1, 1, 80</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quā (sc. virtute) nostri milites facile superabant,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:3:14" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 3, 14</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">1, 40</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">numero militum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:29:30:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 29, 30, 8</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">numero hostis, virtute Romanus superat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:9:32:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 9, 32, 7</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">tantum superantibus malis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:16:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 3, 16, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sorte,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:38:36:10" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 38, 36, 10</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">victor, superans animis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:5:473" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 5, 473</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">hostes equitatu superare,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0588,001:Ages. 3:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Nep.</author> Ages. 3, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">unde salo superant venti,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1224,001:3:5" default="NO"><author>Prop.</author> 3, 5</bibl></cit> (4, 4), 29: <cit><quote lang="la">superat sententia Sabini,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:5:31" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 5, 31</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">si superaverit morbus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:7:1:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 7, 1, 3</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n46824.5" n="2" level="3"> <hi rend="ital">To exceed</hi>, <hi rend="ital">be in excess</hi>, <hi rend="ital">be superfluous; to be abundant</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to abound</hi> (syn. supersum): <cit><quote lang="la">in quo et deesse aliquam partem et superare mendosum est,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,037:2:19:83" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> de Or. 2, 19, 83</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">pecunia superabat? at egebas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,040:67:224" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Or. 67, 224</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">uter igitur est divitior? cui deest an cui superat?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,047:6:3:49" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Par. 6, 3, 49</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quis tolerare potest, illis divitias superare, nobis rem familiarem etiam ad necessaria deesse?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:C. 20:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> C. 20, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">cui quamquam virtus, gloria ... superabant,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 64:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> J. 64, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quae Jugurthae fesso superaverant,</quote> <trans><tr>had been too much for</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:ib. 70:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> ib. 70, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">de eo quod ipsis superat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,048:5:15:42" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Fin. 5, 15, 42</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Quinto delegabo, si quid aeri meo alieno superabit et emptionibus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:13:46:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Att. 13, 46, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superabat umor in arvis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:5:804" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 5, 804</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superante multitudine,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 3, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">cum otium superat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:17" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 3, 17</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">num tibi superat superbia?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,001:2:2:86" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Am. 2, 2, 86</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">gentis superant tibi laudes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0660,001:4:1:28" default="NO"><author>Tib.</author> 4, 1, 28</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">dum superat gregibus juventas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:3:63" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 3, 63</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">si superant fetus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 1, 189</bibl></cit>: quam facile tunc sit omnia impedire et quam hoc Caesari superet, non te fallit, perh. <hi rend="ital">how exceedingly easy it would have been</hi>, Cael. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:8:5:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Fam. 8, 5, 3</bibl> dub.—</sense><sense id="n46824.6" n="3" level="3"> <hi rend="ital">To be left over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to remain</hi>, <hi rend="ital">survive</hi> (syn. supersum): <cit><quote lang="la">quae superaverint animalia capta, immolant,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:6:17" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 6, 17</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quod superaret pecuniae,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,005:3:84:section=195" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Verr. 2, 3, 84, § 195</bibl></cit>: quae arma superabunt, Pompon. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:8:12" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Att. 8, 12</bibl>, A, § 4; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,020:5:49" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Truc. 5, 49</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">nihil ex raptis commeatibus superabat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:22:40:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 22, 40, 8</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">pepulerunt jam paucos superantes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:22:49:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 22, 49, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">si de quincunce remota est Uncia, quid superat?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,006:328" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> A. P. 328</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">sex superant versus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1224,001:4" default="NO"><author>Prop.</author> 4</bibl></cit> (5), 2, 57: <cit><quote lang="la">pars quae sola mei superabit corporis, ossa,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0660,001:3:2:17" default="NO"><author>Tib.</author> 3, 2, 17</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,020:prol. 20" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Truc. prol. 20</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">superet modo Mantua nobis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,001:9:27" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> E. 9, 27</bibl></cit>: uter <cb n="SUPE" /> eorum vitā superarit, <hi rend="ital">whichever survives</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:6:19" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 6, 19</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">quae superaverint animalia,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 6, 17</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quid puer Ascanius? superatne et vescitur aurā?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:3:339" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 3, 339</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">captae superavimus urbi,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 2, 643</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:29:7:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 29, 7, 7</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">quid igitur superat, quod purgemus?</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:45:24:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 45, 24, 1</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n46824.7" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">Act.</hi>, <hi rend="ital">to go</hi> or <hi rend="ital">pass over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">rise above; to mount</hi>, <hi rend="ital">ascend; to surmount</hi>, <hi rend="ital">overtop.</hi> </sense><sense id="n46824.8" n="A" level="2"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg> </sense><sense id="n46824.9" n="1" level="3"> In gen.: in altisono Caeli clipeo temo superat Stellas, Enn. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0684,001:L. L. 7:section=73" default="NO"><author>Varr.</author> L. L. 7, § 73</bibl> Müll. (Vahl. <bibl default="NO"><author>Enn.</author> p. 119</bibl>, om. stellas): <cit><quote lang="la">tempestas summas ripas fluminis superavit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,002:1:48" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. C. 1, 48</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ventosum aequor,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,010:591" default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> Ib. 591</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">fluvium,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:4:150" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 4, 150</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">mare,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Oet. 128" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Oet. 128</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">pedibus salsas lacunas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0550,001:3:1031" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Lucr.</author> 3, 1031</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">munitiones,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:5:8:10" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 5, 8, 10</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quas (Alpes) nullā dum viā superatas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:5:34:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 5, 34, 6</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:21:26:4" default="NO" valid="yes">21, 26, 4</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:21:30:5" default="NO" valid="yes">21, 30, 5</bibl>; 21, 38, 1; <cit><quote lang="la">23, 45, 3: Tauro monte superato,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:35:13:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 35, 13, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">montes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:3:270" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> G. 3, 270</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Alpes cursu,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0917,001:1:183" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Luc.</author> 1, 183</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">immensa montium juga,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,002:81:1" default="NO"><author>Plin.</author> Pan. 81, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Caucasum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:7:3:22" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 7, 3, 22</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">hoc jugum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:6:676" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 6, 676</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">fossas,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 9, 314</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">summi fastigia tecti Ascensu,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 2, 303</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">caprae gravido superant vix ubere limen,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,002:3:317" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> G. 3, 317</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">retia saltu (vulpes),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:7:767" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 7, 767</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">tantum itineris,</quote> <trans><tr>to traverse</tr>, <tr>pass over</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,001:33" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> Agr. 33</bibl></cit>: regionem castrorum, <hi rend="ital">to go past</hi> or <hi rend="ital">beyond</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,002:1:69" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. C. 1, 69</bibl>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:1:19:43" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Tusc. 1, 19, 43</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">insidias circa ipsum iter locatas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:2:50:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 2, 50, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">collocatur in eo turris tabulatorum quae superaret fontis fastigium,</quote> <trans><tr>but so as to overtop</tr>, <tr>command</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0530,001:B. G. 8:41" default="NO"><author>Hirt.</author> B. G. 8, 41</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">superat (Parnassus) cacumine nubes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:1:317" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 1, 317</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n46824.10" n="2" level="3"> In partic. </sense><sense id="n46824.11" n="a" level="4"> Naut. t. t., <hi rend="ital">to sail by</hi> or <hi rend="ital">past</hi> a place, a promontory, etc.; <hi rend="ital">to double</hi> or <hi rend="ital">weather</hi> a point, etc.; promontorium, Lucil. ap. <bibl default="NO"><author>Serv.</author> Verg. A. 1, 244</bibl>; Auct. B. Afr. 62, 3; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:26:26:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 26, 26, 1</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:30:25:6" default="NO" valid="yes">30, 25, 6</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:31:23:3" default="NO" valid="yes">31, 23, 3</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:15:46" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 15, 46</bibl> et saep.: <cit><quote lang="la">Euboeam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0588,002:3:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Nep.</author> Them. 3, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">cursu Isthmon,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,008:1:11:5" default="NO"><author>Ov.</author> Tr. 1, 11, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">intima Regna Liburnorum et fontem Timavi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:1:244" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 1, 244</bibl></cit> Serv.— <usg type="style">Poet.</usg>, transf.: musarum scopulos, Enn. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,039:19:76" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Brut. 19, 76</bibl> (Ann. v. 223 Vahl.).— </sense><sense id="n46824.12" n="b" level="4"> <hi rend="ital">To rise above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">exceed</hi> in height: <cit><quote lang="la">ut alibi umbilico tenus aqua esset, alibi genua vix superaret,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:36:45:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 36, 45, 9</bibl></cit>; cf.: posterior partes superat mensura priores, i. e. <hi rend="ital">exceeds</hi> in size, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:15:378" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 15, 378</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n46824.13" n="B" level="2"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg>, <hi rend="ital">to surpass</hi>, <hi rend="ital">excel</hi>, <hi rend="ital">exceed</hi>, <hi rend="ital">outdo</hi>, <hi rend="ital">outstrip</hi> in any quality, in value, etc. </sense><sense id="n46824.14" n="1" level="3"> In gen.: <cit><quote lang="la">non potest quaestus consistere, si eum sumptus superat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,015:1:2:74" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Poen. 1, 2, 74</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ne sumptus fructum superet,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0684,001:R. R. 1:53" default="NO"><author>Varr.</author> R.
