G. 2, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ut supra dixi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,043:2:4:9" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Rep. 2, 4, 9</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,052:4:15" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Lael. 4, 15</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">14, 48</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ut supra scripsi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:6:27:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 6, 27, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">de quo (filio) commemoravi supra,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0588,001:Dion, 6:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Nep.</author> Dion, 6, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra repetere,</quote> <trans><tr>farther back</tr>, <tr>from past times</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:C. 5:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> C. 5, 9</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 5:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> J. 5, 3</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:16:18" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 16, 18</bibl>.—<hi rend="ital">Comp.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">quantum valerent inter homines litterae, Dixi superius,</quote> <trans><tr>before</tr>, <tr>farther back</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0975,001:4:23:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Phaedr.</author> 4, 23, 2</bibl></cit>: ut superius demonstravimus, Auct. B. Hisp. 28, 4; 34, 5.—</sense><sense id="n47008.4" n="2" level="3"> Of number or measure, <hi rend="ital">beyond</hi>, <hi rend="ital">over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">more</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra adjecit Aeschrio,</quote> <trans><tr>offered higher</tr>, <tr>more</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,005:3:33:section=77" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Verr. 2, 3, 33, § 77</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">amor tantus ut nihil supra possit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:14:1:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Fam. 14, 1, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ita accurate, ut nihil posset supra,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,057:13:19:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Att. 13, 19, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">nihil pote supra,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0134,006:2:3:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ter.</author> Ad. 2, 3, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">voltu Adeo modesto, ut nihil supra,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0134,001:1:1:93" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> And. 1, 1, 93</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0134,003:3:1:37" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Eun. 3, 1, 37</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">nihil supra Deos lacesso,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:2:18:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 2, 18, 11</bibl></cit>.—After <hi rend="ital">et</hi> or <hi rend="ital">aut</hi> (<usg type="style">poet.</usg> and post-class.): <cit><quote lang="la">agrum fortasse trecentis Aut etiam supra nummorum milibus emptum,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 2, 2, 165</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">quot illum putas annos secum tulisse? Septuaginta et supra,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 43 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">tricena aut supra stipendia numerantes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:1:35" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 1, 35</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">a triginta annis et supra,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:tlg,0527,004:4:23" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vulg.</author> Num. 4, 23</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">4, 30</bibl>; <bibl default="NO">4, 35</bibl> (cf. II. B. 2. infra).—</sense><sense id="n47008.5" n="b" level="4"> With <hi rend="ital">quam</hi>, less freq. <hi rend="ital">quod</hi>, <hi rend="ital">above</hi> or <hi rend="ital">beyond what</hi>, <hi rend="ital">more than</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">saepe supra feret, quam fieri possit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,040:40:139" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Or. 40, 139</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">corpus patiens inediae, algoris, vigiliae, supra quam cuiquam credibile est,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:C. 5:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> C. 5, 3</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:J. 24:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> J. 24, 5</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">dominandi supra quam aestimari potest avidissimus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1224,001:Epit. 1" default="NO"><author>Aur. Vict.</author> Epit. 1 <hi rend="ital">med.</hi></bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra quam optari potuit,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Amm.</author> 17, 1, 12</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra quod capere possum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:32:1:28" default="NO"><author>Dig.</author> 32, 1, 28</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n47008.6" n="II" level="1"> <hi rend="ital">Prep.</hi> with <case>acc.</case>, <hi rend="ital">above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">over.</hi> </sense><sense id="n47008.7" n="A" level="2"> <usg type="style">Lit.</usg>, of place: <cit><quote lang="la">si essent, qui sub terrā semper habitavissent ... nec exissent umquam supra terram,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,050:2:37:95" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> N. D. 2, 37, 95</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ille qui supra nos habitat,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0119,014:5:2:38" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plaut.</author> Pers. 5, 2, 38</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra tribunal et supra praetoris caput,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,005:3:33:section=77" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Verr. 2, 3, 33, § 77</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra eum locum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,002:2:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. C. 2, 9</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra se in summo jugo,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:1:24" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> B. G. 1, 24</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">accubueram horā nonā ... et quidem supra me Atticus, infra Verrius,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,056:9:26:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Fam. 9, 26, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">saltu supra venabula fertur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:9:553" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 9, 553</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra segetes Navigat,</quote> <trans><tr>over the cornfields</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:1:295" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 1, 295</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">attolli supra ceteros mortales,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:34:27" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 34, 6, 12, § 27</bibl></cit> (dub.; <cit><quote lang="la">Jahn, super): supra lignum turba insilit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0975,001:1:2:20" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Phaedr.</author> 1, 2, 20</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ecce supra caput homo levis ac sordidus,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>burdensome</tr>, <tr>annoying</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,058:1:2:2:section=6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Q. Fr. 1, 2, 2, § 6</bibl></cit>; so, <cit><quote lang="la">supra caput esse,</quote> <trans><tr>to be close at hand</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:C. 52:24" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> C. 52, 24</bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:3:194" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 3, 194</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:17:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 3, 17, 4</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:4:22:6" default="NO" valid="yes">4, 22, 6</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:4:69" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> H. 4, 69</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Ep 108" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Ep 108</bibl>; <cit><quote lang="la">rarely supra capita,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:42:42:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 42, 42, 6</bibl></cit>.— </sense><sense id="n47008.8" n="2" level="3"> In partic., of geographical position, <hi rend="ital">above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">beyond</hi>: supra Maeotis paludes, Enn. ap. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,049:5:17:49" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Tusc. 5, 17, 49</bibl> (Epigr. v. 7, p. 163 Vahl.): <cit><quote lang="la">supra Suessulam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:23:32:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 23, 32, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Syene oppidum, quod est supra Alexandriam quinque millibus stadiorum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:2:183" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 2, 73, 75, § 183</bibl></cit>; <cit><quote lang="la">supra Britanniam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:2:217" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 2, 97, 99, § 217</bibl></cit>. —</sense><sense id="n47008.9" n="B" level="2"> <usg type="style">Trop.</usg> </sense><sense id="n47008.10" n="1" level="3"> Of time, <hi rend="ital">before</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">paulo supra hanc memoriam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,001:6:19" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. G. 6, 19</bibl></cit>; supra septingentesimum annum, Liv. praef. § 4.—</sense><sense id="n47008.11" n="2" level="3"> Of number, degree, or quantity. </sense><sense id="n47008.12" n="(a)" level="5"> With <hi rend="ital">numbers</hi>, = plus, amplius (not in Cic. or Cæs.), <hi rend="ital">over</hi>, <hi rend="ital">above</hi>, <hi rend="ital">beyond</hi>, <hi rend="ital">more than</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra quattuor milia hominum orabunt ut, etc.,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:43:3:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 43, 3, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">caesa eo die supra milia viginti,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:30:35:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 30, 35, 3</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:31:4" default="NO" valid="yes">3, 31, 4</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra septem milia hominum domos remisit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:21:23:6" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 21, 23, 6</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:23:17:2" default="NO" valid="yes">23, 17, 2</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:23:37:11" default="NO" valid="yes">23, 37, 11</bibl> sq.; 23, 49, 13; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0684,001:R. R. 3:2:17" default="NO"><author>Varr.</author> R. R. 3, 2, 17</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0684,001:3:6:1" default="NO">3, 6, 1</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0684,001:3:7:11" default="NO">3, 7, 11</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra duos menses sapor ejus non permanet integer,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:12:49:3" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 12, 49, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">tres (cyathos),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0893,001:3:19:15" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Hor.</author> C. 3, 19, 15</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n47008.13" n="(b)" level="5"> In gen.: <cit><quote lang="la">quibus solida ungula, nec supra geminos fetus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:11:233" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 11, 40, 95, § 233</bibl></cit>; cf.: <cit><quote lang="la">de floribus supra dictus scripsit Theophrastus,</quote> <trans><tr>besides</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:21:13" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 21, 3, 9, § 13</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">hominis fortunam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,044:2:16:41" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Leg. 2, 16, 41</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ratio supra hominem putanda est deoque tribuenda,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,050:2:13:34" default="NO"><author>id.</author> N. D. 2, 13, 34</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">potentia, quae supra leges se esse velit,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> Ep. ad Brut. 1, 17, 6</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">humanam supra fortunam,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0975,001:4:24:24" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Phaedr.</author> 4, 24, 24</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra Coclites Muciosque id facinus esse,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:2:13:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 2, 13, 8</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">modum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:21:7:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 21, 7, 7</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0845,001:4:27:4" default="NO"><author>Col.</author> 4, 27, 4</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">vires,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 1, 18, 22</bibl></cit>: humanam fidem <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:34:38" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 34, 7, 17, § 38</bibl>: morem, Verg. G. <cb n="SURD" /> 2, 227; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:C. 3:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> C. 3, 2</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">supra belli Latini metum id quoque accesserat, quod,</quote> <trans><tr>besides</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:2:18:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 2, 18, 3</bibl></cit>.—Prov.: <cit><quote lang="la">supra homines, supra ire deos pietate,</quote> <trans>i. e. <tr>to attain the highest degree</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:12:839" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 12, 839</bibl></cit> Heyne ad loc.—</sense><sense id="n47008.14" n="3" level="3"> Sometimes to indicate that <hi rend="ital">over</hi> which one is placed as superintendent (mostly postclass.): <cit><quote lang="la">dispositi, quos supra somnum habebat,</quote> <trans><tr>watchers</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:6:11:3" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 6, 11, 3</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">qui supra bibliothecam fuerunt,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1056,001:7" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Vitr.</author> 7</bibl></cit>, praef. § <cit><quote lang="la">5: servus supra rationes positus,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Pseudo</author> Quint. Decl. 353</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">SVPRA INSVLAS,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Inscr. Orell.</author> 721</bibl></cit> and 2927: <cit><quote lang="la">SVPRA IVMENTA,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>ib.</author> 2870</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">SVPRA VELARIOS,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>ib.</author> 2967</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">SVPRA COCOS,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>ib.</author> 2827</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO"><author>Inscr. Grut.</author> p. 1111, 1</bibl>.—</sense><sense id="n47008.15" n="III" level="1"> Compounds formed with supra are extremely rare. In late Lat. supradictus, suprafatus, suprafundo, suprajacio, supranatans, suprasedeo, etc., are found, but here supra is properly written separately as an <pos>adv.</pos>; only suprascando (v. h. v.), on account of its signif., is to be written as one word.</sense></entryFree>
